SEARCH
Package com.example.sulfurevents

Class NotificationItem

java.lang.Object
com.example.sulfurevents.NotificationItem
public class NotificationItem extends Object
Data model representing a single notification addressed to an entrant.

Each instance of NotificationItem corresponds to a document stored in Firestore under Profiles/<deviceId>/notifications/<notificationId>. This object holds metadata and user-facing text for notifications such as:

  • “You were selected for [Event Name]” (INVITED)
  • “You were not selected for [Event Name]” (NOT_SELECTED)

This class directly supports user stories:

  • US 01.04.01 – Notification when chosen from the waiting list
  • US 01.04.02 – Notification when not chosen for the event
  • US 01.05.02 – Invitation acceptance workflow
  • US 01.05.03 – Invitation decline workflow
It provides a static factory method fromDoc(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot) for converting Firestore documents into model instances.

Author: sulfur (CMPUT 301-Part 3)

    Field

    String

    Firestore document ID of this notification (used for marking as read or updating).

    Identifier of the event this notification is associated with.
    String

    Human-readable name of the related event.
    String
    message
    Textual message shown to the entrant (e.g., “You were selected for ...”).
    boolean
    read
    Indicates whether the entrant has already viewed or responded to this notification.
    long
    timestamp
    UNIX timestamp (in milliseconds) indicating when the notification was created.
    String
    type
    Type of the notification.

  • Field Details

    • docId

      public String docId
      Firestore document ID of this notification (used for marking as read or updating).

    • eventId

      public String eventId
      Identifier of the event this notification is associated with.

    • eventName

      public String eventName
      Human-readable name of the related event.

    • type

      public String type
      Type of the notification. Common values include:
      • INVITED – entrant was selected from the waiting list.
      • NOT_SELECTED – entrant was not selected for participation.

    • message

      public String message
      Textual message shown to the entrant (e.g., “You were selected for ...”).

    • timestamp

      public long timestamp
      UNIX timestamp (in milliseconds) indicating when the notification was created.

    • read

      public boolean read
      Indicates whether the entrant has already viewed or responded to this notification.

  • Method Details

    • fromDoc

      public static NotificationItem fromDoc(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot doc)
      Creates a NotificationItem object from a Firestore document. This method safely extracts all expected fields and applies default values if a field is missing or null.
      Parameters:
      doc - Firestore document representing a notification
      Returns:
      a fully populated NotificationItem instance
